title: ''
labels: ui/ux

---

**Describe the improvement**
A clear and concise description of the UI/UX improvement you are suggesting.

**Current behavior**
Describe how the UI/UX currently behaves.

**Proposed behavior**
Describe how the UI/UX should behave after the improvement.

**Mockups / Screenshots**
If possible, provide mockups or screenshots to illustrate the improvement.

**Reasoning**
Explain why this improvement is necessary or beneficial.
